at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

Class Gatherers

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.Gatherers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    class Gatherers
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    This is a container, containing all gatherers currently working. There exists only one gatherer per gatherer configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<GathererConfiguration,Gatherer> gatherers 
      private java.lang.Object lock 
      private static java.util.logging.Logger logger 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Gatherers()
      Initializing an empty set of gatherers.

      void initialize()
      This method is called, after creating all necessary instances.
      void release()
      This method is called immediately after a shutdown, immediately before the process is stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is called, after creating all necessary instances.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface Component

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method is called, whenever a shutdown sequence is initiated. The shutdown is delegated to all the gatherers and then all gatherers are deleted.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface Component

      • release

        public void release()
        This method is called immediately after a shutdown, immediately before the process is stopped.
        Specified by:
        release in interface Component

      • gathererExists

        boolean gathererExists(GathererConfiguration config)
        Exists a gatherer with this configuration?
        Parameters:
        config - the gatherer configuration
        Returns:
        true if a gatherer with this configuration exists

      • gathererForConfiguration

        Gatherer gathererForConfiguration(GathererConfiguration config)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a gatherer with this configuration. If the gatherer doesn't exists, it will be created.
        Parameters:
        config - the gatherer configuration
        Returns:
        the gatherer, which is not null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is a wrong configuration

      • remove

        void remove(Gatherer gatherer)
        Removes a gatherer from this set of gatherers. If this gatherer isn't known, the method call has no effect.
        Parameters:
        gatherer - the gatherer to remove
